item.title: Report E-2023090006
item.description:
Report E-2023090006

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-11T03:12:58+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-04
  • City: TONAWANDA
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit due to improper blocking and bracing and that one of the large 2000 pound forklift battery(2794) had fallen over and released 1 gallon of acid. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
